security.heading: Confidentiality & Security
security.description: Experience worry-free, confidential payments with our e-wallet app. Your security is our top priority, with robust encryption and cutting-edge safeguards in place to protect your personal and financial information. Trust us for a secure payment experience.
security.insurance: Our constant priority is to ensure the security of your confidentiality.
security.privacy: Your security matters, and so do your payments and transactions with us.
security.security: We`re dedicated to keeping your data safe and secure.

p: If you are already a WallyPay user, then you can order an international Wally MasterCard card.

The main advantage of Wally-Card is security in case of online and physical payment. The Wally card is equipped with the latest technology that eliminates fraudulent transactions. Do not forget, confidentiality is guaranteed, and information about you is carefully stored and protected.
With Wally card you will be able to pay at physical and online merchants in more than 210 countries, and you will be able to withdraw money easily from any ATM.
Request a Wally card at Euro Credit branches, or order it online, here:
WallyPay's international Mastercard can be used anywhere in the world where the MasterCard system is operating.
The Wally-Card can be used at trade outlets, online payments and cash withdrawals at any ATMs in Georgia.
The Wally-Card is equipped with the latest technology Chip, which completely protects the card holder from counterfeit transactions by generating a unique code along with the PIN code.
Most Importantly, using an anonymous card is completely safe when paying online and it also confidentially stores information about the payer.

li: The Wally-Card can be used with a multi-currency account (GE, USD, EUR)
In the international network, Wally-Card can be used in around 210 countries, in 150 currencies, 36 mln POS and 3.3 mln ATMs
Wally_Card can be used in more than 62000 POS and 2500 ATMs in Georgia

p: Do not give up on the Future Opportunities! Order WallyCard right now and take advantage of innovative online services. WallyCard holders can pay / receive funds with mobile app without leaving home. You will also be able to pay with any POS terminal where MasterCard works, withdraw money from any ATM in Georgia and not only, get a pre-approved instant online loan and soon to receive international transfers from around the world.

sections.h2: Join us and become the part of the FUTURE!
li: Take advantage of online payments at international and local online shops
Get a salary or any transfer on a Non-Bank Card
Cash out at more than 2 500 ATMs and Pay with 62,000 POS terminals at merchants
Very Soon, receive cashback from our partners!

footer.text: To order a card, you need to fill out the form below and our operator will contact you within 24 hours.

form.heading: Order card
form.upload: Please upload photos of your ID/Passport
form.selfie: Please upload your photo holding your ID card where identification information is shown clearly
form.verify: by checking I agree to e-wallet and card usage Terms and Conditions.

p: In WallyPay`s mobile app you will find a high-tech electronic wallet that offers innovative financial management capabilities. Our future electronic wallet provides flexible and instant management of personal finances.
Most importantly, any financial transaction is done online, without tedious procedures and allows you to manage your finances anytime, anywhere.
WallyPay`s electronic wallet will also allow you to cover utility costs without leaving home, make personal transfers and more.

li: Offers more comfort to each customer;
Helps us manage our daily finances;

wallet.footer: Download the WallyPay`s mobile app and use the electronic wallet daily.

p: WallyPay`s mobile app is open for cooperation with crypto exchanges. Direct transfer of money from our e-wallet to the Cryptal platform under the best conditions is now easily possible.
We allow people to transfer and withdraw funds from the Cryptal trading exchange to the WallyPay`s Mastercard.
In the future, WallyPay also plans to partner with other crypto exchanges and we believe that our crypto-friendly e-wallet will make it easier for many people to interact with crypto exchanges.

sections.h2: WallyPay is a mobile app created to make your life easier
p: Now you can add the desired amount of money to your current “Euro Credit” auto loan without leaving your home. Also, you can get the highest increased cash limit.

The loan will be approved very quickly, and the amount will appear in your e-wallet instantly, for this you do not need to come to the branch physically. Stay comfortable, save your precious time and energy.
We created WallyPay with future experience, so you can fulfill your future financial desires in the present, right now!
Do not forget to order a safe and secure Wally Mastercard. With the Wally card you will be able to pay at physical and online merchants in more than 210 countries.

loan.footer: WallyApp - 24 hours, 7 days a week at your disposal!

sections.h2: Want to be part of the innovation oriented team?
p: Join us and create opportunities of the future with us! WallyPay offers a unique financial management experience for end customers: We work to create an open and intuitive system that will improve the lives of our clients - with less bureaucracy and more transparency.

li: Microfinance Organization - to move the customer relationship to a new, technological stage
Merchant - to join the card cashback system
Online service provider - those who need a solution to card transactions

footer.text: The number of our partners is growing every day as we provide them with constantly updated and exciting experiences and offers.
footer.email: Contact us at partnership@wallypay.eu and enjoy to travel to the FUTURE with us!

p: WallyPay is a new innovative fintech company on the Georgian market, of which high-tech platform provides a modern, independent and flexible financial management service to its customers. WallyPay combines a mobile app and an international card, supported by Mastercard, offering an innovative and outstanding services: We are dedicated to create an intuitive and friendly system that will improve your Financial Life – with less bureaucracy and more transparency.
WallyPay`s mobile app allows you to manage finances most easily and comfortably; get an instant online loan; convert money into different currencies and receive international money transfers.
Besides, you can pay at 36 million merchants around the world and withdraw money from ATMs by using WallyCard.
WallyPay is a card, E-Wallet and the most reliable partner in the connecting moments between the present and the future.
